summary:
AC plugs and sockets let us connect devices to electricity. Plugs are on the end of cables, and sockets are on walls. When you plug a device in, it gets power from the electrical circuit.

There are many types of plugs and sockets worldwide, with different shapes, sizes, and voltage ratings. Some countries have standard types, and adaptors can help use different plugs in incompatible sockets. These systems ensure safe and convenient electricity use.
title: AC power plugs and sockets
